title: NMMC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 06 TBHV, Medical Officer Posts
description: The Navi Mumbai Municipal Corporation (NMMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 06 Medical Officers, Supervisors, and TB Health Visitor Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ MBBS, Any Degree, B.E./B. Tech, 12th, Diploma, DMLT, MD/MS, and ANM can apply for the NMMC Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Her...
